description.value: HL7-defined code system of concepts used to specify the character set(s) in use. Includes both single-byte and double-byte characters sets, and used in Version 2.x messaging in the MSH segment.

purpose.value: Underlying Code System for V2 table 0211 (Alternate Character Sets, version 2.4)

copyright.value: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

description.value: Version of HL7 in which the code was first defined
Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated
Whether code is considered 'backwards compatible' (whatever that means)

display.value: The printable 7-bit ASCII character set. (This is the default if this field is omitted)

definition.value: The printable 7-bit ASCII character set. (This is the default if this field is omitted)

display.value: The printable characters from the ISO 8859/1 Character set

definition.value: The printable characters from the ISO 8859/1 Character set

display.value: The printable characters from the ISO 8859/2 Character set

definition.value: The printable characters from the ISO 8859/2 Character set

display.value: The printable characters from the ISO 8859/3 Character set

definition.value: The printable characters from the ISO 8859/3 Character set

display.value: The printable characters from the ISO 8859/4 Character set

definition.value: The printable characters from the ISO 8859/4 Character set

display.value: The printable characters from the ISO 8859/5 Character set

definition.value: The printable characters from the ISO 8859/5 Character set

display.value: The printable characters from the ISO 8859/6 Character set

definition.value: The printable characters from the ISO 8859/6 Character set

display.value: The printable characters from the ISO 8859/7 Character set

definition.value: The printable characters from the ISO 8859/7 Character set

display.value: The printable characters from the ISO 8859/8 Character set

definition.value: The printable characters from the ISO 8859/8 Character set

display.value: The printable characters from the ISO 8859/9 Character set

definition.value: The printable characters from the ISO 8859/9 Character set

display.value: Code for Information Exchange (one byte)(JIS X 0201-1976). Note that the code contains a space, i.e. "ISO IR14".

definition.value: Code for Information Exchange (one byte)(JIS X 0201-1976). Note that the code contains a space, i.e. "ISO IR14".

display.value: Code for the Japanese Graphic Character set for information interchange (JIS X 0208-1990), Note that the code contains a space, i.e. "ISO IR87".

definition.value: Code for the Japanese Graphic Character set for information interchange (JIS X 0208-1990), Note that the code contains a space, i.e. "ISO IR87".

display.value: Code of the supplementary Japanese Graphic Character set for information interchange (JIS X 0212-1990). Note that the code contains a space, i.e. "ISO IR159".

definition.value: Code of the supplementary Japanese Graphic Character set for information interchange (JIS X 0212-1990). Note that the code contains a space, i.e. "ISO IR159".

display.value: The world wide character standard from ISO/IEC 10646-1-19931

definition.value: The world wide character standard from ISO/IEC 10646-1-19931
